title: Please ID this octagonal sans
content:
Need ID this font please

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CAMPEON_4710.jpg)

Font: 

 Vincent 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132459/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: fas80

comments.content:
Could be [Vincent](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132459/http:/pixelpixelpixel.com/2013/01/vincent-typeface) mainly because of /E crossbar high position, /A crossbar low position and /M flat centre vertex.  
Alternatives [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132459/http:/typophile.com/node/105488#comment-562631).
